node.title: 3 Are Killed in Shooting at Michigan High School
node.description: A 15-year-old sophomore was taken into custody after firing a semiautomatic handgun 15 to 20 times at Oxford High School in Oakland County, Mich., the authorities said. The dead were all believed to be students.
node.content: ["Three people were killed on Tuesday when a student opened fire with a semiautomatic handgun at a high school in Oxford, Mich., north of Detroit, according to the authorities, who said that they had taken a 15-year-old student into custody.", "The dead were all believed to be students, Michael McCabe, the Oakland County undersheriff, said at a news conference.", "The authorities received the first of more than a hundred 911 calls about the shooting at 12:51 p.m., Undersheriff McCabe said. He said the gunman was a sophomore at the school, \u201cgave up without any problems\u201d and was in custody within five minutes.", "In addition to the three students who were killed, six others were injured, including a teacher, he said. The conditions of those who were injured were not immediately known.", "The gunman, whose name was not immediately released, fired 15 to 20 shots with a semiautomatic handgun, the authorities said.", "The gunman \u201cinvoked his right not to speak\u201d and asked for a lawyer, Undersheriff McCabe said. The authorities said they did not believe he had planned the shooting with anyone else. They said they were still investigating whether it was a random shooting or a targeted one.", "\u201cIt\u2019s a very tragic situation,\u201d Undersheriff McCabe said.", "After evacuating the school, the authorities said that they were doing a second and third search of the school, checking for more victims.", "Footage from local television news coverage showed a heavy police presence, including sheriff\u2019s deputies and Michigan state troopers, outside the school, which is about 40 miles north of Detroit.", "Sheriff\u2019s deputies carrying long guns patrolled the school grounds and emergency medical workers arrived in two helicopters. Emergency medical workers brought a stretcher into the building as at least a half-dozen ambulances waited in the parking lot.", "\u201cThis afternoon there was an active shooter at Oxford High School,\u201d Oxford Community Schools said in a statement, according to WDIV-TV, a local station. \u201cOakland County Sheriff\u2019s Department has secured the scene.\u201d", "Students and staff members were \u201csystematically being evacuated\u201d to a nearby Meijer store, where they could be picked up, the school district said.", "Rosemary Bayer, a state senator who represents the district that includes Oakland County, said in a statement that \u201cthe news of today\u2019s school shooting at Oxford High School is simply horrifying.\u201d"]
